targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(*) as Facade
FROM augur_operations.collection_status 
WHERE 
(facade_data_last_collected < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '14 days' OR facade_data_last_collected IS NULL) AND 
facade_status != 'Ignore'

SELECT count(*) as Core
FROM augur_operations.collection_status 
WHERE 
(core_data_last_collected < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '14 days' OR core_data_last_collected IS NULL) AND 
core_status != 'Ignore'

SELECT count(*) as Secondary
FROM augur_operations.collection_status 
WHERE 
(secondary_data_last_collected < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '14 days' OR secondary_data_last_collected IS NULL)  AND 
secondary_status != 'Ignore'

WITH date_range AS (
    SELECT generate_series(
        LEAST(
            (SELECT MIN(DATE(facade_data_last_collected)) FROM augur_operations.collection_status WHERE facade_status != 'Ignore'),
            CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '13 days'
        ),
        CURRENT_DATE,
        '1 day'::interval
    )::date AS collection_day
),
final_results AS (
    SELECT 
        dr.collection_day, 
        COUNT(cs.facade_data_last_collected) AS facade_collections 
    FROM 
        date_range dr
    LEFT JOIN 
        augur_operations.collection_status cs 
        ON dr.collection_day = DATE(date_trunc('day', cs.facade_data_last_collected))
        AND cs.facade_status != 'Ignore'
    GROUP BY 
        dr.collection_day
)
SELECT * FROM final_results
-- This filter logic handles the "limit" vs "show all"
WHERE (
    ${recent_days} = -1 
    OR 
    collection_day >= CURRENT_DATE - (${recent_days}::int * INTERVAL '1 day')
)
ORDER BY collection_day ASC;

WITH date_range AS (
    SELECT generate_series(
        LEAST(
            (SELECT MIN(DATE(core_data_last_collected)) FROM augur_operations.collection_status WHERE core_status != 'Ignore'),
            CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '13 days'
        ),
        CURRENT_DATE,
        '1 day'::interval
    )::date AS collection_day
),
final_results AS (
    SELECT 
        dr.collection_day, 
        COUNT(cs.core_data_last_collected) AS core_collections 
    FROM 
        date_range dr
    LEFT JOIN 
        augur_operations.collection_status cs 
        ON dr.collection_day = DATE(date_trunc('day', cs.core_data_last_collected))
        AND cs.core_status != 'Ignore'
    GROUP BY 
        dr.collection_day
)
SELECT * FROM final_results
-- This filter logic handles the "limit" vs "show all"
WHERE (
    ${recent_days} = -1 
    OR 
    collection_day >= CURRENT_DATE - (${recent_days}::int * INTERVAL '1 day')
)
ORDER BY collection_day ASC;

WITH date_range AS (
    SELECT generate_series(
        LEAST(
            (SELECT MIN(DATE(secondary_data_last_collected)) FROM augur_operations.collection_status WHERE secondary_status != 'Ignore'),
            CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '13 days'
        ),
        CURRENT_DATE,
        '1 day'::interval
    )::date AS collection_day
),
final_results AS (
    SELECT 
        dr.collection_day, 
        COUNT(cs.secondary_data_last_collected) AS secondary_collections 
    FROM 
        date_range dr
    LEFT JOIN 
        augur_operations.collection_status cs 
        ON dr.collection_day = DATE(date_trunc('day', cs.secondary_data_last_collected))
        AND cs.secondary_status != 'Ignore'
    GROUP BY 
        dr.collection_day
)
SELECT * FROM final_results
-- This filter logic handles the "limit" vs "show all"
WHERE (
    ${recent_days} = -1 
    OR 
    collection_day >= CURRENT_DATE - (${recent_days}::int * INTERVAL '1 day')
)
ORDER BY collection_day ASC;

SELECT 
    DATE(MAX(date_trunc('day', s.data_collection_date))) AS collection_day, 
    COUNT(s.repo_id) / 19 AS scorecard_collections 
FROM 
    augur_data.repo_deps_scorecard s
JOIN 
    augur_data.repo r ON r.repo_id = s.repo_id
WHERE r.repo_archived_date_collected IS NULL 
GROUP BY 
    DATE(date_trunc('day', s.data_collection_date))
-- The filter logic starts here
HAVING 
    ${recent_days} = -1 
    OR 
    DATE(date_trunc('day', s.data_collection_date)) >= CURRENT_DATE - (${recent_days}::int * INTERVAL '1 day')
ORDER BY 
    collection_day ASC;

panels.description: Tracks the total number of repositories that have been collected within the last ${recent_days} days, broken down by collection phase.
panels.title: Repos with recent collection (14d)

panels.description: Rate of observed query latencies over a 5-minute interval, broken down by bucket (le) and query name.
panels.title: Query Latency (P50/P90/P99) Histogram

panels.description: The proportion of total repositories that were successfully collected today (days_ago=0) across all phases.
panels.title: Today's Collection Success Rate

list.description: Number of days for 'Recent Collection Trend' calculations.
list.label: Recent Days
list.name: recent_days
